vivae.controllers

Class RobotWithSensorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • vivae.controllers.VivaeController
      • vivae.controllers.RobotWithSensorController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FRNNController, KeyControlledSensoryDataPublisher, MyController, SynchronousROSAgent

    public abstract class RobotWithSensorController
extends VivaeController
    One of the extensions of the basic VivaeController class specifying Active object's behavior. This type of Controller is used for Robots equipped with sensors.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Vector<VivaeObject> allObjects
      This Vector of VivaeObjects can be used to store all Objects in the Arena.
      protected boolean isRobotSet
      A boolean variable specifiing if the Robot has been set up.
      protected java.util.Vector<VivaeObject> objectsOnSight
      This Vector of VivaeObjects can be used to store those ArenaObjects in the Arena, that are on sight of the sensors.
      protected Robot robot
      The Active object controlled by this controller.
      protected java.util.Vector<Sensor> sensors
      A Vector of Snesors of the controlled robot.

    • Field Detail

      • isRobotSet

        protected boolean isRobotSet
        A boolean variable specifiing if the Robot has been set up.

      • robot

        protected Robot robot
        The Active object controlled by this controller. This time it's Robot, one of Active's ascendants, because the Active object here has to have Sensors.

      • sensors

        protected java.util.Vector<Sensor> sensors
        A Vector of Snesors of the controlled robot.

      • allObjects

        protected java.util.Vector<VivaeObject> allObjects
        This Vector of VivaeObjects can be used to store all Objects in the Arena. The sensors will then search them for those of them that are on sight.

      • objectsOnSight

        protected java.util.Vector<VivaeObject> objectsOnSight
        This Vector of VivaeObjects can be used to store those ArenaObjects in the Arena, that are on sight of the sensors.
